price: (46) [Allāh] said, "Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
